channel.title: Double Pipcast
channel.itunes:author: Double Pipcast
channel.description: Double Pipcast is a show dedicated to everything "Transformers TCG"

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 1 | Transformers TCG Intro!
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam and Dave introduce themselves on the first episode of the Double Pipcast. Cam gives new players a rundown on what the TF TCG is all about!
item.itunes:summary: Cam and Dave introduce themselves on the first episode of the Double Pipcast. Cam gives new players a rundown on what the TF TCG is all about!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 2 | SDCC Cards!
item.itunes:author: Double Pipcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam flys solo into SDCC card territory. Touching on Omnibots, Soundwave v Blaster, and Wave 4's covert announcement
item.itunes:summary: Cam flys solo into SDCC card territory. Touching on Omnibots, Soundwave v Blaster, and Wave 4's covert announcement
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 3 | Introducing Aaron - Playing 1 v 1 Over Audio?
item.itunes:subtitle: Aaron aka BRKNSTR joins the Double Pipcast! We weave in TCG talk in between some casual play!
item.itunes:summary: Aaron aka BRKNSTR joins the Double Pipcast! We weave in TCG talk in between some casual play!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 4 | Trippin' over Trypticon
item.itunes:subtitle: WotC announces Wave 4 - Trypticon is for big spenders - Loot Crate delivering damaged goods? Cam is left to his own devices, and talks about what's new in the world of the Transformers TCG
item.itunes:summary: WotC announces Wave 4 - Trypticon is for big spenders - Loot Crate delivering damaged goods? Cam is left to his own devices, and talks about what's new in the world of the Transformers TCG
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 5 | Ratrod and Hotbat
item.itunes:subtitle: The drip feed for Wave 4 Siege II reveals is real. The team at TF TCG dropped two reveals last week with Ratbat and Hotrod. Cam tries his hand at amateur sound effects for bumpers, and introduces a new segment called "Let's Talk A Bot It"
item.itunes:summary: The drip feed for Wave 4 Siege II reveals is real. The team at TF TCG dropped two reveals last week with Ratbat and Hotrod. Cam tries his hand at amateur sound effects for bumpers, and introduces a new segment called "Let's Talk A Bot It"
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 6 | Interview with WotC's Drew Nolosco
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam interviews Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game, Drew Nolosco. We touch on Drew's history in the gaming industry, the TF TCG development process, and what's the future holds for the game. Take a peak behind the energon curtain!
item.itunes:summary: Cam interviews Global Brand Manager of the Transformers Trading Card Game, Drew Nolosco. We touch on Drew's history in the gaming industry, the TF TCG development process, and what's the future holds for the game. Take a peak behind the energon curtain!
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast

item.title: Double Pipcast | Episode 7 | The Secret of Omega Supreme?
item.itunes:subtitle: Cam dives into the biggest promo card the Transformers TCG has seen, Omega Supreme. What's this card about, and what cards lend themselves to making him less meh?
item.itunes:summary: Cam dives into the biggest promo card the Transformers TCG has seen, Omega Supreme. What's this card about, and what cards lend themselves to making him less meh?
item.itunes:keywords: Transformers, Trading Card Games, Double Pipcast
